images.copyright: Tiny gecko on a leaf (© Darren Greenwood/Alamy)
images.title: Peek-a-boo, I see you!
images.caption: World Lizard Day
images.desc: When trying to draw attention to World Lizard Day, you don't want to lead off with a scary Gila monster or monitor lizard. Nope, what you want front and center is a cute little gecko like the one we see here. Geckos come in varying sizes across 1,500 species and are unique among lizards for their vocalizations for mating, distress, and social interactions.
